dt: {bc}a shoe consisting of a sole strapped to the foot
{bc}a low-cut shoe that fastens by an ankle strap
{bc}a strap to hold on a slipper or low shoe

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French, from Latin {it}sandalium{/it}, from Greek {it}sandalion{/it}, diminutive of {it}sandalon{/it} sandal
shortdef: a shoe consisting of a sole strapped to the foot
a low-cut shoe that fastens by an ankle strap
a strap to hold on a slipper or low shoe
